bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for Electric Power Substation Physical and Electronic Security
IEEE Guide for Electric Power Substation Physical and Electronic Security

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Security issues related to human intrusion upon electric power supply substations are identified and discussed. Various methods and techniques presently being used to mitigate human intrusions are also presented in this guide.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
